verification_amount_inside.label: Verification amount inside range
verification_amount_inside.info: The amount of verifications the app need to mark a beacon inside the range.

verification_amount_outside.label: Verification amount outside range
verification_amount_outside.info: The amount of verifications the app need to mark a beacon outside the range.

interval.label: De interval between updates in seconds
interval.info: The delay between reading sensor values in seconds. The minimal interval is 1 second.

timeout.label: Discovery timeout
timeout.info: Amount of seconds that is given to discover the beacons.
